intros.title: Whispering Gateway
text: The MazeScroll opens on a whisper, the air thick with dreamlight.
Your hero steps through a fractured arch, echoes of past runs chasing their heels.

intros.title: Ember Path
text: Flames gutter along the corridor, illuminating ancient murals.
Each mural depicts a hero lost to time, waiting for their legacy to rekindle.
